--- product_code: fn03 description: 10mm Fantasy da Vinci Wingsuit Flyers title: 10mm Fantasy da Vinci Wingsuit Flyers breadcrumb: da Vinci Wingsuit Flyers name: Fantasy da Vinci Wingsuit Flyers cost: $20.00 paypal_id: PYZ9WAE7BQB48 ---

Brave, bold and more than likely a little mad, these birdmen come equipped with crossbows and the latest in inventions from the great inventor himself: wingsuits!

This is a da Vinci Wingsuit Flyers unit of nine figures. You will recieve one leader (fn03a), eight rank and file figures (a mix of fn03b–e) and nine wings (a mix of fn03f–g).
